name: Black Diamond Talon Hook
description: A necessity for big wall climbers, this unique piece provides 3 options for hooking over edges and flakes on aid climbs.The other hook options act as a 2-pronged base to keep placements stable.Covers small to medium hooking clearances of 4.7mm, 7.6mm, 12.7mm.Tie off hole in center (tie knot on back and thread forward).
